insert all
into B_G2_01002 (ID, MAINID, XC, JKLBH, JKFLBH, SCZ, DW_SCZ, ZQZ, DW_ZQZ, YDZ_Q, YDZ_QDW, YDZ_H, YDZ_HDW, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ) values (#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jklbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jkflbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwScz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.zqz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwZqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ydzQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ydzQdw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ydzH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ydzHdw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update B_G2_01002
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XC = #{xc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JKLBH = #{jklbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JKFLBH = #{jkflbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCZ = #{scz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DW_SCZ = #{dwScz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZQZ = #{zqz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DW_ZQZ = #{dwZqz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YDZ_Q = #{ydzQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YDZ_QDW = #{ydzQdw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YDZ_H = #{ydzH,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YDZ_HDW = #{ydzHdw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select B_G2_01002.ID, B_G2_01002.MAINID, B_G2_01002.XC, B_G2_01002.JKLBH, B_G2_01002.JKFLBH, B_G2_01002.SCZ, B_G2_01002.DW_SCZ, B_G2_01002.ZQZ, B_G2_01002.DW_ZQZ, B_G2_01002.YDZ_Q, B_G2_01002.YDZ_QDW, B_G2_01002.YDZ_H, B_G2_01002.YDZ_HDW, B_G2_01002.ZT, B_G2_01002.WHBMID, B_G2_01002.WHRID, B_G2_01002.WHSJ from B_G2_01002 LEFT JOIN D_00601 D00601 ON D00601.jklbh =B_G2_01002.jklbh where 1 = 1 and B_G2_01002.MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by D00601.PXH
